title: Luxury Sweet House for Sale
details:
Luxury house at heart of the Colombo City which closes to the main hospital like Mulleriyawa and Jayawaderapura central hospital. It is near to highway entrances from Kaduwala and Malabe entries. House consists of five-bedrooms with three bathrooms and 20 perches. The land has access to 20ft entrance road and boundary walls. The house is 2-floor and 2nd floor access to a rooftop garden and additional bedroom. All the utility accesses are there with tap water and two water tanks. Currently,

The house is rented out as two separate units with two separate utility bills. There is enough space to build another house or build a swimming pool. We have made storeroom at the end of the land. The house is built in colonial design with Sri Lankan style. Car porch is unique design with high columns and massive wooden pillars. All the window and doors are Kos and Mahogany timbers.

Pantry cupboards are built in the kitchen, and house consists of two halls and dining room. Hall is decorated with a finished wooden timber roof. It has enough sunlight come to home from the high roof and large windows. There is a staircase built inside and outside to entrance to 1st floor and another staircase access to the 2nd-floor rooftop garden.

We already renting the property as two unit and earn monthly income of 75000/= per month. It is good for company for office use. It is near to all the city areas and important commercial centers.

Address : 276/9E Jayanthi Mawathe, Hibutana road, Mulleriyawa.
